item.title: About Me
item.description: Heya! My name is Nafaal and I’m currently undergoing my undergraduate degree in Computer Science at the University of Bristol. I am currently very interested in understanding more about the cyber security field, although I am keen on learning anything computer science related. Update, May 2023. I am not keen on learning anything web dev. No. You can find more details on my CV here
